game.name: Borderlands 2: Gunzerker Domination Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Enhance your Vault-hunting experience with a fresh new style! This pack contains the Major Malfunction head and In the Trenches skin for the Gunzerker - look for them in the character customization menu! This content not included in Season Pass.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enhance your Vault-hunting experience with a fresh new style! This pack contains the Major Malfunction head and In the Trenches skin for the Gunzerker - look for them in the character customization menu! This content not included in Season Pass.
